Marine Rope

Asia Dragon is a leading producer and distributor of polyester ropes and blended rope. We supply a range of quality ropes for all uses at competitive prices.

Feature

Feature

Strength

High strength baling twine for small square bales.

Natural fibre

Natural fibre colour.

Easy running

Free of knots for easy running in the baler.

Perfectly spooled

Minimal loose fibres to reduce build up in knotters.
